column4: Hi all, im looking for some kind of easy to use programm to manage my ipod toutch 1g. (running FW 3.0, Jailbroken) on my 9.10 ubuntu.  im at a crap motell, and cant get i nett signal on ipod, so no ssh, and no virtuall box, any suggestions? /pm -Thanks
